title: Beyond Repair
description: Danny, a bachelor in the city, must deal with rent and maintenance calls when he inherits his apartment building from his landlord. Includes the recent Beyond Repair Reunion Special.
altHero: Danny at the kitchen table with a lady friend while Freddy holds an empty tray; everyone is screaming
alt1: Danny is shocked when he arrives home to a surprise party
alt2: Danny stands in the kitchen while Freddy sits behind him on the counter
alt3: Freddy doing bicep curls with an iron
alt4: Freddy sitting on a Murphy bed in a robe with an eye mask on his forehead
